text: Arau yetiya'i sihamtara oparata sasti ahichila tetiya'i sihamte kaichila, ‘he mucha! Tumi tomara pratipalakara ocarata amara babe praarthana karaa tomara lagata te'om yi angikara karaiche se'i anuyayi; yadi tumi amara paraa sasti dura karai diba paraa tente ami niscaya tomara oparata imana anima arau arasye bani icharaa'ilaka tomara lagata yabalai dima’
